title: Fix Brand ult indicator
body: It's nearly turret range or is turret range big when you cursor over it but I've cast it a bunch of times with enemy champs at the edge (behind indicator mark) without creeps nearby of it then it doesn't bounce.

replies.body:
Holy crap, so im not the only one whos noticed.
Hell, theres been times ive had champs right next to each other too and it hasn't bounced.
